title: Cabraal released on Rs. 10 Mn bail on Criminal Breach of Trust complaint
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Former Central Bank Governor Ajith Nivard Cabraal was ordered to be released on a personal bail of Rs. 10 Million by the Fort Magistrate’s Court on Tuesday (7).
Cabraal appeared in court over a complaint filed against him on the misappropriation of USD 6.5 Million in Public Funds and Criminal Breach of Trust.
Cabraal released on Rs. 10 Mn bail on Criminal Breach of Trust complaint
